subject: RE: [junit] Testing-MailingList wanted
msgSnippet: Try comp.software.testing newsgroup. Scott Stirling Macromedia ... From: Egger, Wolfgang To: junit@yahoogroups.com Sent: 5/14/01 9:02 AM Subject: [junit]
messageBody:
Try comp.software.testing newsgroup.

Scott Stirling
Macromedia

-----Original Message-----
From: Egger, Wolfgang
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: 5/14/01 9:02 AM
Subject: [junit] Testing-MailingList wanted

Servus,

I'm a QM and I have to install some TestProcedures.
For some reasons UnitTests with JUnit are suitable.
But we are developin a distributet web-based System with our own
MiddleWareSystem. To test this it seems, that JUnit is the wron one. So
I'm
looking for a mailinglist or a newsgroup that is dedicated for common
test-topics.

Please send me an email, if someone konws about such a group or list.

Thanx in advance

Wolfgang Egger
